full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=========================

**Notice Details**
-----------------

- **Title** (English): Business Transformation SBIPS
- **Title** (French): Transformation des affaires SPICT
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01027073
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Publication Date**: 2023-02-22

**Tender Details**
-----------------

- **CLOSING DATE AND TIME**: 2023-03-08T14:00:00
- **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)

**Supply Chain Management**
-------------------------

- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: The notice may fall under the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (AECG). The following conditions apply:
    - AECG compliant proposals must include:
        - Contract duration: (2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31)
        - Additional supplier conditions: Please refer to the attached documents.

**Contract Information**
----------------------

- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-04-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31
- **Contracting Entity**: Industry Canada
- **Contact Information**: Heidi Gagne, heidi.gagne@ised-isde.gc.ca, 343-542-9135, 235 Queen St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5.

**Related Documents**
----------------------

- English document: Download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/b7e66fb54879f1e8d860af1a5ddad133/npp_ic206142.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/b7e66fb54879f1e8d860af1a5ddad133/npp_ic206142.pdf)
- French document: Download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/7fe7c325b1539c30e6af2677f0b2ba6f/apm_ic206142.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/7fe7c325b1539c30e6af2677f0b2ba6f/apm
